text:
Whenever any member of the Police Department or Fire Department shall become incapacitated for the performance of his duty on account of heart trouble or pneumonia, which develops or manifests itself while such member is in the service of his department, such heart trouble and such pneumonia shall be presumed to arise out of and in the course of his employment, unless there is evidence to the contrary. 
(Ord. No. 559(1939), Sec. 1)

heading.catch_text: POLICEMEN AND FIREMEN INCAPACITATED WITH HEART TROUBLE OR PNEUMONIA – WHEN PRESUMED CONTRACTED IN COURSE OF EMPLOYMENT.
